title: Myself and friends trapped in attempting to reconnect to game we were playing (10 minutes+)
body:
We were playing and suddenly the game just stopped, we couldn't issue any commands. A couple of us tried leaving the game and reconnecting but we can't. I don't see anyone else posting about the issue but we can't start another game either. Just kinda sitting here.

Edit: Almost two hours later, Still trapped

replies.body: I wasn't able to find any issues or widespread problems here.  Are you guys playing locally together?  Your network may have had a hiccup, causing ya'll to disconnect.  Are you still having issues?

its happening to me as well and the person i am playing with and we live no where near each other. In fact i'm streaming it right now going on 50+minutes of stuck trying to reconnect to game 
https://www.twitch.tv/adaren21

This sounds like a ghost game issue.  Did the match end at all, or was it mid game?  A ghost game usually happen when the game can't reach our servers to communicate that it ended.  Relogging or waiting it out will usually solve this.  In the meantime, I'll be keeping my eyes out and seeing if anything is going on.
Well after 3 hours of streaming trying to reconnect the game finally ended.

Well i just re logged again. And its been over an hour and a half since the dc. and i'm still stuck only able to try and reconnect to the game after several restarts. And i'm still streaming it if you want to see.

> [{quoted}](name=Sinistar21,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IqTEBqPV,comment-id=0000000000000001,timestamp=2016-11-13T00:39:55.174+0000)
>
> Well i just re logged again. And its been over an hour and a half since the dc. and i'm still stuck only able to try and reconnect to the game after several restarts. And i'm still streaming it if you want to see.

Don't worry, same for me and my friends.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IqTEBqPV,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-13T00:15:31.473+0000)
>
> This sounds liek a ghost game issue.  Did the match end at all, or was it mid game?  A ghost game usually happen when the game can't reach our servers to communicate that it ended.  Relogging or waiting it out will usually solve this.  In the meantime, I'll be keeping my eyes out and seeing if anything is going on.

The match didn't end while we were in it. We had 3 of their inhibitors If i remember correctly (its been awhile) and we were about to be ending but then everything just stopped.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IqTEBqPV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-13T00:03:05.532+0000)
>
> I wasn't able to find any issues or widespread problems here.  Are you guys playing locally together?  Your network may have had a hiccup, causing ya'll to disconnect.  Are you still having issues?

No we are not playing together. Im in California the rest are in different parts of the states. we're all just stuck. =/

By together I mean locally. Its all the same game however. 

I've tried restarting client, computer, and router but still can't connect to the game, even though im pretty sure it doesn't exist anymore.

the same thing happened to me. at the 10-ish minutes the models and minions froze and i tried to reconnect. As of now the game still says it is in progress at over 80 min. 

My network is working and i have tried restarting the client as well
